tool.name: OGS: generateGeometry
tool.description: Galaxy wrapper for the OGS utility 'generateGeometry'.
tool.command: generateGeometry --z0 '$z0' --y0 '$y0' --x0 '$x0' --z1 '$z1' --y1 '$y1' --x1 '$x1' #if str($nx).strip() != 'None' and str($nx).strip() != '': --nx '$nx' #end if #if str($nx1).strip() != 'None' and str($nx1).strip() != '': --nx1 '$nx1' #end if #if str($ny).strip() != 'None' and str($ny).strip() != '': --ny '$ny' #end if #if str($ny1).strip() != 'None' and str($ny1).strip() != '': --ny1 '$ny1' #end if #if str($nz).strip() != 'None' and str($nz).strip() != '': --nz '$nz' #end if #if str($nz1).strip() != 'None' and str($nz1).strip() != '': --nz1 '$nz1' #end if #if str($geometry_name).strip() != 'None' and str($geometry_name).strip() != '': --geometry_name '$geometry_name' #end if #if str($polyline_name).strip() != 'None' and str($polyline_name).strip() != '': --polyline_name '$polyline_name' #end if --output output_1.gml

param.name: z0
param.label: z0
param.help: z coordinate of the first point

param.name: y0
param.label: y0
param.help: y coordinate of the first point

param.name: x0
param.label: x0
param.help: x coordinate of the first point

param.name: z1
param.label: z1
param.help: z coordinate of the first point

param.name: y1
param.label: y1
param.help: y coordinate of the first point

param.name: x1
param.label: x1
param.help: x coordinate of the first point

param.name: nx
param.label: nx
param.help: number of subdivisions in x direction

param.name: nx1
param.label: nx1
param.help: number of subdivisions in x direction

param.name: ny
param.label: ny
param.help: number of subdivisions in y direction

param.name: ny1
param.label: ny1
param.help: number of subdivisions in y direction

param.name: nz
param.label: nz
param.help: number of subdivisions in z direction

param.name: nz1
param.label: nz1
param.help: number of subdivisions in z direction

tool.help: This tool runs the **generateGeometry** utility from the OpenGeoSys suite.
